name: Deportivo Alavés Fan Token
description: The Deportivo Alavés Fan Token is the BRC-20 smart contract designed to revolutionize fan experiences. With Token, Deportivo Alavés provides fans with the opportunity to participate in exclusive surveys and events, create digital collections, purchase NFTs, enjoy gamification and mission features linked to fan rewards, missions and great experiences. DAFT, Deportivo Alavés Fan Token can be used in the following functions. Survey and Events DAFT Token holders can participate in Paid and Free Surveys or Events on the Bitci Fan Token Platform. Loyalty Subscription DAFT Token holders will be able to use Deportivo Alavés Tokens to receive fan rewards, digital collectibles, loyalty points and more. Advantages DAFT Token holders, including signed products, interact with Deportivo Alavés on the Bitci Fan Token Platform to meet and greet one of the players or legends, one-on-one phone calls, entrance to the locker room, watching matches in VIP or similar areas, signed official products, limited edition collectibles etc. can take advantage of the benefits. Games and Quests DAFT Token holders will have access to multiple missions and gamification features on the Bitci Fan Token Platform.
